repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: At Tufts, A Weekly Gazette for the University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains issues of At Tufts. Published weekly from April 1976 to December 1979(?), "At Tufts" began as a weekly calendar of events but widened its scope to include news items. From 1976-79 it was known as 'At Tufts: A Weekly Calendar for the University.' Also included is a sample edition of a tabloid publication 'Tufts University Journal & Review,' dated October 4, 1979, which was intended to take the place of 'At Tufts.' It was published by the Office of Public Information.

Missing Issues: Volume 2, 1976-77, Numbers 1,12,14,15,17, 18 (September 10, December 10 and 23 and January 7, 20, and 27): Volume 3, 1977-78, Numbers 2 and 36 (September 16 and May 26): Volume 5, 1979, Number 6 (October 12).

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

did.unittitle: At Tufts, A Weekly Gazette for the University

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains the publication "At Tufts" which was published weekly from April 1976 to December 1979(?). "At Tufts" began as a weekly calendar of events but widened its scope to include news items. From 1976-79 it was known as 'At Tufts: A Weekly Calendar for the University.' Also included is a sample edition of a tabloid publication 'Tufts University Journal & Review,' dated October 4, 1979, which was intended to take the place of 'At Tufts.'
